sentences.sentence: Sixty percent of people answered negatively.
This will negatively affect the result over the first half of the year.
sentences.translation: 这将会给前半年的结果带来负面影响。

sentences.sentence: As these electrons are negatively charged they will attempt to repel each other.
sentences.translation: 由于这些电子都带负电荷，它们会相互排斥。
